text: He majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Mi yacya mobadalyata tumacyakaduna kasalehi dhana magata nahi. Majha mobadala tara kevala sarvasrestha allahajavala ahe, na mi imanadharakanna apalya javaluna dura karu sakato, tyanna apalya palanakartyasi bhetayace ahe. Parantu mi ase pahato ki tumhi loka murkhapana karita ahata
